original_title: Nick Cave and the Cavemen: La Edad De Oro 84
overview: Spain, 11/20/1984  Four songs from the set were broadcast on Spanish television’s avant garde music show La Edad de Oro: an incendiary version of Screamin’ Jay Hawkins’ “I Put a Spell on You,” “Well of Misery,” the Birthday Party’s “Mutiny in Heaven,” and Elvis’ Presley’s “In the Ghetto.”
title: Nick Cave and the Cavemen: La Edad De Oro 84
